error.title: ERROR!
error.description:
Something went wrong, please, try again later

Error ID: {{ERROR_ID}}

definition.name: invite
definition.description: Gives you an invite link to add the bot

invite.description:
Beep boop! Your invite link is ready:
{{INVITE_URL}}

definition.name: settings
definition.description: Configure and see different aspects about the bot in this server

buttons.deleteSettingsConfirm: Are you sure? All the data related to this server will be restored to its defaults (except block and premium status)
buttons.deleteSettingsDone: All the data has been restored

customDigits.resetSuccess: Numbers restored to the default ones.

classicPremiumUpgrade.success:
Done! The next step is invite the premium bot:
{{BOT_LINK}}
classicPremiumUpgrade.errorCannotUpgrade: You can't upgrade the server because it already has premium.
classicPremiumUpgrade.noServerUpgradesAvailable: You can't do more server upgrades because you don't have more server upgrades available

definition.name: setup
definition.description: Used to create some basic counter channels

server.name: server
server.description: Used to setup server related counters

youtube.name: youtube
youtube.description: Used to setup server related counters

channel-url.description: Please provide the following input: YouTube channel link

channel-name.description: Please provide the following input: Twitch channel name

account-name.description: Please provide the following input: Twitter account name

definition.name: check-permissions
definition.description: Checks if the bot has the correct permissions to work correctly.

checkPermissions.title: Check permissions
checkPermissions.adminWarning: **This bot has administrator permission, please toggle off the administrator permission and setup the right permissions**
checkPermissions.footer: If you need to fix permissions problems, try inviting the bot again:

ManageChannels.name: Manage channels
ManageChannels.description: Used to update the name/description of the channels to update the counters

ViewChannel.name: View channels
ViewChannel.description: Used to update the name/description of the channels to update the counters, also used to receive commands

Connect.name: Connect
Connect.description: Used to update the name/description of the channels to update the counters

ReadMessageHistory.name: Read message history
ReadMessageHistory.description: Used to update counters in messages/embeds

AddReactions.name: Add reactions
AddReactions.description: Used to add reactions in commands to interact with it

ManageMessages.name: Manage messages
ManageMessages.description: Used to remove reactions in a command

ManageRoles.name: Manage roles
ManageRoles.description: Used by the setup command and to update channel permissions when you add a Premium bot

BanMembers.name: Ban members
BanMembers.description: Used to display the amount of banned members in the `{bannedMembers}` counter

definition.name: lock-channel
definition.description: You can use this commands to show a lock pad (ðŸ”’) instead of a speaker (ðŸ”Š) in voice channels.

lockChannel.success: Done! Now, **for non admin users**, the channel will be displayed with a ðŸ”’
lockChannel.errorNoPerms: I can't edit the channel {CHANNEL} due to lack of permissions

definition.name: premium
definition.description: Get information about Member Counter Premium.

fields.name: **âœ… ALL the counters**
fields.value: Get access to **all** the counters that exists in the bot, like `{twitchFollowers}` or `{youtubeSubscribers}`

fields.name: **âœ… More accurate**
fields.value: Get more accurate counts in all members related counters

fields.name: **âœ… Unlimited servers**
fields.value: Pay only for the members and servers you have. For â‚¬5 EUR per 50,000 members and 5 servers, quarterly

fields.name: **âœ… Custom bot**
fields.value: Use your own bot account, with the profile picture and username of your choice

fields.name: **âœ… Easy to setup**
fields.value: In a few clicks, you can create your own Member Counter bot, and we will take care of updating it. Guide with screenshots included! Isn't this easier than self-hosting?

definition.name: profile
definition.description: Shows related information between you and this bot.

profile.removeDataConfirmation:
If you click the {{DELETE_DATA}} button. Please type exactly this text if you want to delete all your data: ```{{CONFIRMATION_STRING}}```
:warning: **This action will remove all your data, your badges, server upgrades and credits will be lost forever, invoices will be kept for legal reasons, are you sure you want to continue? (Ignore or type '{{CANCEL_STRING}}' to cancel)**
profile.removeDataConfirmationString: I want to delete all of my data
profile.removeDataSuccess: Your data has been removed successfully
profile.userNotFound: User not found in the DB
profile.invalidTextInputProvided: Please try again and provide a valid text input either `{{CANCEL_STRING}}` or `{{CONFIRMATION_STRING}}`
